data.comment: The match has started, with Wigan kicking-off.
The match has started, with Wigan kicking-off.
Glen Rea for Luton has been booked by Gavin Ward and receives a first yellow card.
Kieffer Moore (Wigan) gets a yellow card.
Luton's Isaiah Brown has been booked in Wigan.
The first-half has come to a close in Wigan.
Anthony Pilkington is on a sub for Gary Roberts for Wigan.
Luton have kicked-off the second half at DW Stadium.
Michael Jacobs is replacing Gavin Massey for the home team.
Paul Cook is making the team's third substitution at DW Stadium with Joe Garner replacing Jamal Lowe.
The away team have replaced Harry Cornick with Kazenga LuaLua. This is the first substitution made today by Graeme Jones.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
